executable.title: RegAladin (NiftyReg)
executable.description: Module/executable for global registration (rigid and/or affine) based on a block-matching approach and a trimmed least squared optimisation.
executable.contributor: Marc Modat, Pankaj Daga, David Cash (UCL)

parameters.label: Input images. Reference and floating images are mandatory
parameters.description: Input images to perform the registration

image.name: referenceImageName
image.description: Reference image filename (also called Target or Fixed)
image.label: Reference image

image.name: floatingImageName
image.description: Floating image filename (also called Source or moving)
image.label: Floating image

image.name: referenceMaskImageName
image.description: Filename of a mask image in the reference space
image.label: Ref. mask

image.name: floatingMaskImageName
image.description: Filename of a mask image in the floating space. Only used when symmetric turned on
image.label: Flo. mask

float.name: smoothReferenceWidth
float.description: Standard deviation in mm (voxel if negative) of the Gaussian kernel used to smooth the reference image
float.label: Ref .Smooth

float.name: smoothFloatingWidth
float.description: Standard deviation in mm (voxel if negative) of the Gaussian kernel used to smooth the Floating image
float.label: Flo. smooth

float.name: referenceLowerThreshold
float.description: Lower threshold value applied to the reference image
float.label: Ref. Low Thr.

float.name: referenceUpperThreshold
float.description: Upper threshold value applied to the reference image
float.label: Ref. Up Thr.

float.name: floatingLowerThreshold
float.description: Lower threshold value applied to the floating image
float.label: Flo. Low Thr.

float.name: floatingUpperThreshold
float.description: Upper threshold value applied to the floating image
float.label: Flo. Up Thr.

file.name: inputAffineName
file.description: Affine registration matrix stored as a text file
file.label: Input affine trans. from NiftyReg

parameters.label: Registration output
parameters.description: Final affine transformation and warped image

file.name: outputAffineFileName
file.description: Affine registration matrix output, saved as a text file
file.label: Output affine filename

parameters.label: Various optimisation parameters
parameters.description: Various optimisation parameters such as the size of the pyramid or the number of level to use in the pyramidal approach

integer.name: levelPyramidNumber
integer.description: Number of levels to use to generate the pyramids for the coarse-to-fine approach
integer.label: Level number

integer.name: levelToPerformNumber
integer.description: Number of levels to use to run the registration once the pyramids have been created
integer.label: Level to perform

integer.name: iterationNumber
integer.description: Maximal number of iterations of the trimmed least square approach to perform per level
integer.label: Iteration number

float.name: blockPercentage
float.description: Percentage of blocks to use in the optimisation scheme
float.label: Percentage block

float.name: inlierPercentage
float.description: Percentage of blocks to consider as inlier in the optimisation scheme
float.label: Percentage inlier

boolean.name: noSym
boolean.description: The symmetric version of the algorithm is used by default. Use this flag to disable it
boolean.label: Disable symmetry

boolean.name: rigidOnly
boolean.description: Performs only a rigid registration, rigid then affine by default
boolean.label: Rigid only

boolean.name: affineOnly
boolean.description: Performs only an affine registration, rigid then affine by default
boolean.label: Affine only

boolean.name: useHeaderOrigin
boolean.description: Use the nifti header origin to initialise the transformation. Image centres are used by default
boolean.label: Use header

boolean.name: makeIsotropic
boolean.description: Make floating and reference images isotropic if required
boolean.label: Make images isotropic

integer-enumeration.name: interpolation
integer-enumeration.description: Interpolation order to use internally to warp the floating image
integer-enumeration.label: Interpolation order
